## LabelRejectionLineTechnique interface

Technique to avoid label rendering on top of certain line geometries. For technique parameters see \[\[BaseTechniqueParams\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface LabelRejectionLineTechnique extends MakeTechniqueAttrs<BaseTechniqueParams> 
```
